amendment.description: To make certain funds available for Upper Missouri River Basin flood and drought monitoring.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3844 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3844 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Rounds to Amendment SA 3801. (consideration: CR S2409-2410; text: CR S2409) To make certain funds available for Upper Missouri River Basin flood and drought monitoring.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3844 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3844 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Rounds to Amendment SA 3801.
